name: typing-game
description: 駒場祭のタイピングゲーム

scripts.fix: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.setup:env: cp frontend/.env.sample frontend/.env && cp backend/.env.sample backend/.env
scripts.setup:db_push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup:install: npm ci && npm run frontend:ci && npm run backend:ci && npm run setup:db_push
scripts.dev: npm run frontend:dev & npm run backend:dev
scripts.autoupdate: git submodule update && npm ci && npm run frontend:ci && npm run backend:ci && npm run setup:db_push
